introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Meeshy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This detailed privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information in compliance with GDPR and international data protection regulations when you use our multilingual messaging service.

personal.title: 2.1 Profile Information
items: First name, last name, and username
Date of birth (optional, required for certain features)

security.title: 2.3 Account Security
items: Encryption keys to protect your private conversations

voice.title: 2.5 Voice Data and Consents
items: Consent to create voice profile (DateTime or null)

items.title: Customer support:
items.description: Responding to your questions and resolving issues

encryption.title: 4.1 Conversation Encryption
encryption.content: Meeshy offers multiple levels of protection based on your needs: end-to-end encryption (nobody, not even us, can read your messages), server encryption (your messages are protected on our servers), or public conversations. All communications are secured during transmission over the Internet.

anonymous.title: 4.2 Users Without Account
anonymous.content: If you use Meeshy without creating an account, your messages can only benefit from server encryption. For maximum protection, create an account and enable end-to-end encryption.

storage.title: 4.3 Secure Storage
storage.content: Your data is stored on secure servers in Europe with regular backups. Your password is encrypted and can never be read in plain text. Your private encryption keys are protected.

local.title: 4.4 Internal Processing
local.content: Translations are performed directly on our secure servers. No data is sent to third-party services like Google or Microsoft for translation. We control the entire process.

audit.title: 4.5 Security Log
audit.content: We maintain a history of all security events for your account: logins, password changes, two-factor authentication activation. You can review this history at any time in your settings.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We NEVER sell your personal data to third parties. We only share your data in the following cases:
cases: With other participants in your conversations (your messages and translations)
With your explicit consent (data export, profile sharing)
To comply with legal obligations (court orders)
With trusted technical partners (server hosting) under strict confidentiality agreements
In case of merger or acquisition (you will be notified in advance)
sharing.thirdParty: No data is shared with third-party services for translation or analysis. All processing is done internally.

rights.title: 6. Your GDPR Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Delete your account and all your data (with a 30-day grace period)
Export your data in a standard format
Object to processing of your data
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, go to Settings > Privacy or contact us at privacy@meeshy.me. We will respond within 30 days.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention Period
retention.content: We retain your data as long as your account is active. If you delete your account: (1) 30-day grace period allowing recovery; (2) After 30 days, permanent deletion of all your personal data; (3) Messages in shared conversations are anonymized; (4) Security logs are kept for 90 days; (5) Billing data according to legal obligations.
retention.voiceData: Voice profiles automatically expire based on your age: 18-25 years = 5 years, 26-40 years = 10 years, 41-60 years = 15 years, 60+ years = 20 years.

notifications.title: 8. Notifications
notifications.content: You can individually configure notifications for messages, calls, mentions, reactions, friend requests, security events, etc. Do Not Disturb mode allows you to define time ranges without notifications (except critical security alerts).

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: We only use essential cookies for service functionality (authentication, sessions, preferences). No advertising or tracking cookies. You can manage your preferences in your browser settings.

international.title: 10. International Transfers
international.content: Your data is hosted on servers located in France and the European Union. If you access Meeshy from outside the EU, your data may be transferred to the EU. These transfers are protected by the European Commission's standard contractual clauses and comply with GDPR.

updates.title: 11. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Important changes will be notified to you by email and via an in-app notification. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page. Continuing to use Meeshy after an update means you accept the new policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, your personal data, or to exercise your GDPR rights:
contact.address: Postal address: 12 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France
contact.dpa: In case of an unresolved dispute, you have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority) at: www.cnil.fr
